name: I'm Awesome
description:
The world is falling apart and you need to... keep it messy! Forget heroism. Do whatever you want, you're here to be awesome!

** FEATURES **

CRAZY ACTION BEAT'EM UP!

ARCADE AND RANKING
Get the most points and reach the top rank.

LOCAL MULTIPLAYER
Join your friends and play in cooperative mode, OR NOT, if you want to beat them head on!

15 ACHIEVEMENTS
Find and get all achievements. 3 of them are secret!

12 TRADING CARDS
Collect them all!

THANKS

You ARE awesome! B-]
